name: Painter Selection Portfolio Library
summary: A SELECTIONPORTFOLIOLIBRARY file stores a collection of path-based selections created and used by Corel Painter, a digital drawing application. It contains default and user-created selections (or shapes) users can access through the application. Painter users export and import SELECTIONPORTFOLIOLIBRARY files to preserve and share libraries of path-based selections.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
